To connect to Imgur, you need to confirm that Order66 is allowed to access the images. This confirmation is requested by Imgur using special dialogs. Everything that needs to be confirmed there is beyond the control of Order66. Should the confirmation process be started?

The name of the app is based on Star Wars, where Order 66 was an order that the clone troopers could not disobey and which resulted in the extinction of the Jedi. Of course, this app is NOT intended to exterminate the Jedi, but the current instructions of the pet owners are to be followed.
This is a webapp for creating and managing informations for pet sitters who are looking after the pets during absence of their owners.
